last_episode_to_air.overview: Sir Percival's secret is exposed, and Walter risks everything for the woman he loves.

name: The Woman in White
overview: The lives of two half-sisters and their drawing master get caught up in a deadly conspiracy revolving around a mentally ill woman dressed all in white.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: After a haunting encounter with a woman dressed all in white, drawing master Walter Hartright is struck by a startling resemblance between her and his beautiful new pupil Laura Fairlie.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: Laura is forced to set aside her love for Walter and marry Sir Percival, whose character takes a dark turn. Marian finds herself drawn to his enigmatic friend, Count Fosco.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: Sir Percival goes to violent lengths to get his hands on Laura's fortune, while Marian starts to suspect there might be something sinister behind Count Fosco's charming facade.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: Count Fosco and Sir Percival's plan is set into motion with tragic results. Marian and Walter make a horrifying discovery whilst seeking justice for Laura.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: Sir Percival's secret is exposed, and Walter risks everything for the woman he loves.
